bibl.title: Three Papyri from Theadelpheia in Gent.
bibl.note: Publishes three papyri in expectation of a full edition of the Fund Cumont (bought in 1908 for the University of Gent), within the framework of a Ph.D. on the history of Theadelpheia and Euhemeria. - 1. P. Gent Inv. 41 recto. Fragment of a kat' êndra-diary. AD 165, June 25/27. - 2. P. Gent Inv. 17a verso. Report of Plêrôtai. About AD 155-165. - 3. P. Gent Inv. 17e verso. List of Pittakion Members. About AD 165. <kat' andra>
FRANCE Jacques, Three Papyri from Theadelpheia in Gent.
ZPE 123 (1998) pp. 135-144, 2 tabl. et pll. IX-XI.
141.4 P. Gand. Inv. 17a verso; 17e verso; 41 recto
